description.value:
Trigger A creature who doesn't bear the sigil of Kharnas attempts to open the door

Effect A surge of the Radiant Spark's latent power courses through the glyph and washes over the triggering creature. If the creature is undead, it takes [[/r 10d10[positive]]] damage. If it's living, it instead regains [[/r 10d10[healing]]]{10d10 Hit Points}. It then must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:40|traits:incapcitation,mental] save or be affected by a 6th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dominate]{Dominate} spell.

The spell commands the affected creature to attack the nearest creature who doesn't bear the sigil of Kharnas.

details.description: A hidden glyph suddenly lights up and dominates the mind of any creature not bearing the sigil of Kharnas the Angel-Binder.
details.disable: Disable @Check[type:thievery|dc:46|name:Destroy Glyph|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to destroy the glyph, @Check[type:arcana|dc:42|name:Divert Glyph's Power] (master) to harmlessly divert the glyph's power, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic} (7th level; counteract DC 38) to counteract the glyph
details.reset: The glyph can affect two creatures before it deactivates for 5 minutes and automatically resets.

source.value: Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege
